title: Check Navigational Channel Depth
description: A deep-draft vessel is scheduled to arrive. The pilot needs to confirm the current depth of the navigational channel, considering the tide.

tasks.description: Get the vessel's required draft from the nomination.
tasks.expected_outcome: Pilot confirms the vessel has a draft of 14.5 meters.

tasks.description: Check the latest hydrographic survey chart for the channel's official depth.
tasks.expected_outcome: The chart shows a minimum depth of 12 meters.

tasks.description: Check the tide tables for the vessel's ETA and calculate the total water depth to ensure it is sufficient.
tasks.expected_outcome: Pilot checks the tide will be +3 meters at ETA, making the total depth 15 meters. This provides enough under-keel clearance, and the pilot approves the transit.
